mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.user_id as userId, t.work_date as workDate, t.week as week, t.work_year as workYear, t.work_month as workMonth, t.status as status, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.insert_time as insertTime, t.update_time as updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT t.pname, t.pcode, t.workDate, t.startTime, t.endTime, (case when (t.dow IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 )) then '16:30:00' when (t.dow in (6,7)) then t.startTime end) as otStartTime, t.ot, t.endTime as otEndTime FROM ( SELECT mui.pname AS pname, mui.pcode AS pcode, mw.work_year AS workYear, mw.work_month AS workMonth, mw.work_date AS workDate, mw.start_time AS startTime, mw.end_time AS endTime, MW.`week` as dow, SEC_TO_TIME( TIME_TO_SEC( ( CASE WHEN mw.end_time > '17:30:00' THEN TIMEDIFF( mw.end_time, '16:30:00' ) END ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ) AS ot FROM mf_user_info mui LEFT JOIN mf_work mw ON mui.id = mw.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND MUI.is_it = 1 AND MW.`week` IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ) AND mw.work_year = #{query.workYear} AND mw.work_month = #{query.workMonth} AND MUI.pcode = #{query.pcode} UNION ALL SELECT mui.pname AS pname, mui.pcode AS pcode, mw.work_year AS workYear, mw.work_month AS workMonth, mw.work_date AS workDate, mw.start_time AS startTime, mw.end_time AS endTime, MW.`week` as dow, SEC_TO_TIME( TIME_TO_SEC( ( TIMEDIFF( mw.end_time, mw.start_time ) ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification_it t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) ) AS ot FROM mf_user_info mui LEFT JOIN mf_work mw ON mui.id = mw.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND MUI.is_it = 1 AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 ) AND mw.work_year = #{query.workYear} AND mw.work_month = #{query.workMonth} AND MUI.pcode = #{query.pcode} ) t ORDER BY t.workDate ASC

SELECT t.pname, t.pcode, t.workDate, t.startTime, t.endTime, (case when (t.dow IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 )) then '16:30:00' when (t.dow in (6,7)) then t.startTime end) as otStartTime, t.ot, t.endTime as otEndTime FROM ( SELECT mui.pname AS pname, mui.pcode AS pcode, mw.work_year AS workYear, mw.work_month AS workMonth, mw.work_date AS workDate, mw.start_time AS startTime, mw.end_time AS endTime, MW.`week` as dow, SEC_TO_TIME( TIME_TO_SEC( ( CASE WHEN mw.end_time > '17:30:00' THEN TIMEDIFF( mw.end_time, '16:30:00' ) END ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 1 ) ) AS ot FROM mf_user_info mui LEFT JOIN mf_work mw ON mui.id = mw.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND MUI.is_it = 0 AND MW.`week` IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ) AND mw.work_year = #{query.workYear} AND mw.work_month = #{query.workMonth} AND MUI.pcode = #{query.pcode} UNION ALL SELECT mui.pname AS pname, mui.pcode AS pcode, mw.work_year AS workYear, mw.work_month AS workMonth, mw.work_date AS workDate, mw.start_time AS startTime, mw.end_time AS endTime, MW.`week` as dow, SEC_TO_TIME( TIME_TO_SEC( ( TIMEDIFF( mw.end_time, mw.start_time ) ) ) * ( SELECT t.mag_value FROM mf_magnification t WHERE t.work_date_type = 2 ) ) AS ot FROM mf_user_info mui LEFT JOIN mf_work mw ON mui.id = mw.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND MUI.is_it = 0 AND MW.`week` IN ( 6, 7 ) AND mw.work_year = #{query.workYear} AND mw.work_month = #{query.workMonth} AND MUI.pcode = #{query.pcode} ) t ORDER BY t.workDate ASC
